title: Accounts: Managing an Account
body:
Accounts: Managing an Account¶

revisit

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Accounts

  4. Click an account to view account details

  5. Click Teams to view the team(s) to which the user belongs

  6. Click and Add Team to add the user to a new team (in addition to their current team)

    • Click Assign roles and select the desired roles

    • Click Done

    • Click Save

  7. Click and Reset Password ???

  8. Click and Sign Out of All Devices ???
toc: • Accounts: Managing an Account
